integrations.name: Hotelbeds
integrations.description: Global hotel inventory and booking API integration
challenges: Complex authentication with token refresh mechanisms
Data normalization across multiple hotel property types
solutions: Implemented token caching with automatic refresh
Built request queuing system to respect rate limits
Used streaming for large dataset imports
Created unified data model mapping different property structures

challenges: Real-time availability checks with strict timeout requirements
